message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100 right now.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've already invested a lot in this product, and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $140.
Alice, $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in your product, but I'm only able to offer $120 at this point.
I'm not willing to go as low as $120, Bob. However, I'm willing to compromise again. I'll meet you at $130. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm going to stick to my previous offer of $120. I hope you'll consider it.
I've already told you, Bob, I won't go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $130, which is $125. That's my final offer. Take it or leave it.
